feels.name: Remorse
feels.quote: This also was my doing! And my father’s woe, and the desolation of that late so smiling home all was the work of my thrice-accursed hands!

causedBy.name: Realization of the consequences of his actions

feels.name: Despair
feels.quote: I was seized by remorse and the sense of guilt, which hurried me away to a hell of intense tortures such as no language can describe.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: I was restrained, when I thought of the heroic and suffering Elizabeth, whom I tenderly loved, and whose existence was bound up in mine.

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: Devil,” I exclaimed, “do you dare approach me? And do not you fear the fierce vengeance of my arm wreaked on your miserable head?

feels.name: Curiosity
feels.quote: I was partly urged by curiosity, and compassion confirmed my resolution.

feels.name: Compassion
feels.quote: I was deeply affected by it. If such lovely creatures were miserable, it was less strange that I, an imperfect and solitary being, should be wretched.

Events.name: Realization of the consequences of his actions
